[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627392121732{margin-top: 40px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”100% 95%”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1627392091148{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1575910391251{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9276″ img_size=”348×518″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1627392106613{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1575910384631{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

We deliver high-class painting and decorating services to Apartments in London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ text_align=”left”]

The Good Painter is here to deliver the best outcome and finish to your apartment project, with our flexible hours and experienced team. Our painting and decorating services are here to provide customers with an excellent, hassle-free process while transforming your apartment to the property of your dreams!

[/vc_column_text]
See Our Company Brochure
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627392459115{margin-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552405503107{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″]

Painting and Decorating Apartments in London

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Delivering to all Apartments in London, our specialised painters and decorators will offer a friendly and high-quality service to ensure a sophisticated and complete renovation to your space.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1627392221922{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9289″ img_size=”652×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Quality Guaranteed

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

Our painters and decorators only use the best tools and materials when working on your apartment, guaranteeing excellent finishes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9290″ img_size=”652×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Full Protection

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

We know how important it is to protect any of your furniture or belongings; therefore our team will ensure full protection of your goods.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9291″ img_size=”652×500″ onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Excellent Results

[vc_column_text font_weight=”300″]

Our professional team listen and are passionate about new projects, therefore our full attention is on you, your requirements and your space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627392997606{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552509497433{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

Ready to renovate and transform your Apartment in London?

[/vc_column_text]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1567495745783{margin-left: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1628836481288{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” font_family=”Playfair Display” font_size=”d:30|pp:25″ text_align=”center”]

Painting and decorating projects we have delivered across London

[/vc_column_text]

Before and After: A chic and stylish painting and decorating makeover for a busy London businesswoman

When Ana first came to us, she had just become the owner of a two-bedroom…

Painting and Decorating a London Investment Property in Paddington

This investment property in London is located on the second floor of a Victorian building…

Success Story: Painting and decorating a unique apartment in Mayfair, London

A few years back our clients Maria and Pavel had just bought their dream home…

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627393147730{background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers say about us and
painting and decorating jobs we have completed across London

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552923219689{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_row_inner]

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
